_sText: awp_dusty_v1 This is my first CS:S release, and I wanted to start off simple. I was trying to practice using cubemaps, HDR, shadows, and lighting. The map itself is a simple awp map. It was designed simple, to help people practice with the awp, while providing a detailed environment. It's a 32 man map, features limited protection, and is a flat level to practice head shotting. The map runs well on any computer. Features -HDR -env_sun -Detailed lighting -Realistic Environment -Shadow Control Install 1) Download to your desktop 2) Right click and extract to the following location C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\accountnamer\counter-strike source\cstrike 3) Start CS:S and enjoy Please leave some feedback!
